dcterms:creator: M.-I. Nicolae
dcterms:description: A large and reliable benchmark containing more than 50000 traffic sign image samples over 43 classes, used to evaluate the robustness of deep neural networks against adversarial attacks.
dcterms:title: German Traffic Sign Benchmark (GTSB)

dcterms:creator: M.-I. Nicolae
dcterms:description: A dataset containing more than 5000 real-time screenshots from autonomous vehicles, labeled for steering angle predictions, used to assess the performance of deep learning models in self-driving applications.
dcterms:title: Udacity Self-Driving (USD)
